bioRad: Biological Analysis and Visualization of Weather Radar Data

Source: R/bioRad.R
bioRad-package.Rd

Extract, visualize and summarize aerial movements of birds and insects from weather radar data. See <doi:10.1111/ecog.04028> for a software paper describing package and methodologies.

Details

To get started, see:

  • Dokter et al. (2019): a paper describing the package.

  • bioRad vignette: an introduction to bioRad's main functionalities.

  • Function reference: an overview of all bioRad functions.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/adokter/bioRad

  • https://adokter.github.io/bioRad

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/adokter/bioRad/issues
